COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa
STRING: As I prepared for school at the usual time, Phorni
seemed a little restless.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, shouldn't we hurry up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x142
STRING: [Chris] “No need for that. At this time, we'll even be a
little earlier than usual.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a
STRING: [Phorni] “...Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x180
STRING: [Chris] “Anyway, I'm almost ready, just wait a second.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d6
STRING: I put on my jacket last, and stood at the front door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e2
STRING: Phorni was already there, so I put her on my shoulder
and opened the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f8
STRING: [Chris] “Guess there's no need to say ‘I'm heading out?’”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22a
STRING: [Phorni] “Why not? Doesn't hurt to say it. See you later!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x240
STRING: [Chris] “Well, it was always meant for your ears, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x268
STRING: [Phorni] “Is that so?! I thought you were just speaking to
yourself...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x296
STRING: Ah, I mean, I thought you were being polite?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ac
STRING: [Chris] “Oh come on, that wasn't necessary.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2de
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm kidding. Of course I knew that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2f4
STRING: With a smile that suggested otherwise, Phorni turned
and said “See you later!” once again to the empty room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x352
STRING: [Phorni] “This way? Is it this way?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x368
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, it's this way. We're heading to the school
right now, so you don't need an explanation, right?
Also, it's not like you're doing the walking anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ae
STRING: [Phorni] “That's beside the point. It's been so long since
I've done this!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c4
STRING: [Chris] “That's true...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3da
STRING: Looking at Phorni happily take in the city, I remembered
that it really had been a while for her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f0
STRING: She seemed very pleased to be outdoors.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3fc
STRING: In the first place, she'd never really shown interest in
going out, so I'd always assumed she didn't care for it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41c
STRING: Or perhaps she was just excited to see the school for
the first time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x432
STRING: [Chris] “Are you happy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x464
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? Yes, it's been a while...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47a
STRING: Her wings moved gently, which tickled my ear a bit.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x490
STRING: [Chris] “Hey... Sit still.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c2
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, sorry!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d8
STRING: [Chris] “Are you that happy about going to school? All
you'll be doing is keeping an eye on me, you know. And
no singing, you'll disrupt my practicing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x51e
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes, I heard you the first time. Besides, school
may be fun, but right now I'm enjoying being outside.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x53e
STRING: [Chris] “You can just go out whenever you want, you
know? You can't fly high, perhaps, but you can get
around on foot, I'm sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57a
STRING: [Phorni] “Yes, that may be true. But between this, and
going out by myself...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59a
STRING: [Chris] “But, you know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5cc
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah! I didn't mean it like that. It's not like I want
to go out all the time, I feel happy just going out
occasionally, like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ec
STRING: [Chris] “...Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61e
STRING: [Phorni] “Really.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x634
STRING: Somehow, I knew that was a lie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x640
STRING: It'd be different if we were talking about going out
everyday, but Phorni only went outside the room a few
times each year.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x656
STRING: She always said it was okay, so I'd never given it much
thought until now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x66c
STRING: Seeing Phorni enjoy herself like this, however, made me
realize what a stupid assumption that had been.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x682
STRING: Had I been oblivious to it all this time?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68e
STRING: Now that I was going to part ways with Phorni, I was
suddenly paying more attention to these things.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a4
STRING: If Phorni was okay with it, I wanted to pay even more
attention to them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ba
STRING: I continued the conversation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c6
STRING: [Chris] “...You know, I should've thought of bringing you
to school earlier.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e6
STRING: [Chris] “You probably don't need them, Phorni, but you
might find some things interesting, like music theory or
lessons.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x72c
STRING: [Phorni] “Nah, I'm okay. That's Torta's role.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x74c
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77e
STRING: [Phorni] “...Nothing. Look, Ms. Cordell's gonna be upset
if you don't hurry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b0
STRING: Pointing ahead, Phorni flapped her wings as if to hurry
me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c6
STRING: We didn't have much time to chat after that, but one
thing stayed in my mind the whole time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7dc
STRING: “Torta's role.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e8
STRING: I was sure that's what I heard her say.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7f4
STRING: That seemed like a long time ago, but actually it might
have been just before I came to this city.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80a
STRING: It was when I'd asked Arie to come with me to the
music school that all three of us went to at the time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x820
STRING: Arie had already realized that music wasn't her thing,
and she was focused on other pursuits while remaining
in the school.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x840
STRING: She did things that she liked, such as cooking, cleaning
and laundry.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x856
STRING: That's why her reply was similar to Phorni's.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86c
STRING: “That's Torta's role.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x878
STRING: I didn't know at the time why we were divided up that
way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88e
STRING: Even now, I had no idea.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x89a
STRING: Did Phorni feel the same way Arie did when she said
that?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b0
STRING: If I could figure out the reason, I'd probably understand
Phorni and Arie a lot better.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ec
STRING: [Phorni] “Penny for your thoughts?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x902
STRING: Noticing my gaze, Phorni turned to me and spoke
gently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x918
STRING: That gesture reminded me of Arietta, for some reason.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x924
STRING: [Chris] “...No, it's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a6
STRING: [Cordell] “Good morning. You're a little late today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9bc
STRING: [Chris] “Really? By just a little, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d2
STRING: I'd probably walked too carefully, so that Phorni
wouldn't fall off my shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e8
STRING: Or perhaps I'd been too focused on our conversation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1a
STRING: [Phorni] “It's because you kept stopping to think about
things.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa30
STRING: Yeah, I know.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3c
STRING: I placed Phorni on top of my desk in the classroom.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: [Cordell] “Hmm? ... Odd. Anyway, let's begin. Same
song as always, yes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa7a
STRING: [Chris] “About that... I'd like to practice a new song, if
that's okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xab6
STRING: [Cordell] “A new song? I don't mind, I assume it's for the
graduation recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad6
STRING: [Chris] “Yes. The vocal part has also been prepared.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf4
STRING: [Phorni] “Chris, what are you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb0a
STRING: [Chris] “I don't have a partner yet, and that was when I
came up with this song, which I'm really into right now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb50
STRING: [Cordell] “That sounds like fun. Well, I don't mind if you
practice something you like, but it's about time you
found a partner.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7a
STRING: [Chris] “I know. But if the time comes, then please help
me out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb6
STRING: [Cordell] “...Huh. That thing I mentioned, eh. That's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbcc
STRING: [Chris] “Okay... Here's the score.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbe2
STRING: I handed Ms. Cordell a clean copy of the score that I
finished the day before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc0c
STRING: [Chris] “I look forward to your guidance.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc2a
STRING: [Cordell] “...Hmm, the lyrics are only half-finished...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc40
STRING: [Chris] “They'll be done.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc72
STRING: [Cordell] “Okay. But... They don't sound like your usual
lyrics, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc92
STRING: [Chris] “Is that so...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc4
STRING: [Cordell] “Ah, I don't mean it in a bad way. Now then,
let's hear it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: Ms. Cordell looked at the score, seemingly amused.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd7c
STRING: [Cordell] “It's still a little rough, but it's a good song.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd92
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc4
STRING: [Cordell] “Perhaps your emotions are the cause, but it's
completely changed, and in a very short time. As a
Fortelle instructor, nothing could be more interesting to
me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdee
STRING: [Chris] “...What has changed?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0c
STRING: [Cordell] “Your sound, Chris. I said it's still a little rough,
yes? The foundation of practice is repetition. Let's use
all our time today to focus on this song.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe36
STRING: [Chris] “Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4c
STRING: Even Ms. Cordell approved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe6c
STRING: I turned to Phorni to convey this, but she had a worried
look on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe82
STRING: I don't know if she understood, but I gave a look that
said “It's all good,” and returned to the Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed2
STRING: After the morning lesson, I brought Phorni with me to
the cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee8
STRING: I was eating pasta, and Phorni was looking at me with
displeasure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf12
STRING: [Chris] “...What?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf30
STRING: [Phorni] “Why that song?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf46
STRING: [Chris] “What do you mean why... You were happily
singing along at the end, weren't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf5c
STRING: As I spoke, I kept one eye on our surroundings in case
Torta came along.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf72
STRING: Asino wouldn't come to school before his afternoon
lesson, so I wasn't worried about him.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf90
STRING: [Phorni] “But... That's my song, isn't it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa6
STRING: [Chris] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfd8
STRING: [Phorni] “And who is going to sing it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfee
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm, I hadn't thought about that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1020
STRING: [Phorni] “...Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1036
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, I wouldn't let anyone else sing it. That goes
without saying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1068
STRING: [Phorni] “S-Sure? If you say so...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x107e
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry, I didn't think it through. I just wanted
to let Ms. Cordell hear the song.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10ba
STRING: [Phorni] “＊phew＊ That's a relief...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10e8
STRING: Then, why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f4
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1126
STRING: [Phorni] “Why are you practicing a song that you won't
play for the graduation recital?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x113c
STRING: [Chris] “Like I said, I wanted Ms. Cordell to hear it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x115c
STRING: Before Phorni could object, we heard a voice from
behind us.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1192
STRING: [Torta] “Huh? Did you say something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c8
STRING: [Chris] “...No, not at all. Morning, Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11fa
STRING: [Torta] “Morning. And how about the partner situation?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1210
STRING: [Chris] “So-so. I'm not out of options yet.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x122e
STRING: [Torta] “I see, well, that's good. Though if you can't find
anyone, I'll practice with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x124e
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, if it came to that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1264
STRING: ... Those words left my lips, but my heart wasn't in
them.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x127a
STRING: I probably wouldn't pair up with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1286
STRING: “Role.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1292
STRING: Once again, I recalled that word.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x129e
STRING: It was true that until now, my time in school had been
spent with Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12b4
STRING: Much more than I'd spent with my male friend Asino.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12c0
STRING: That's why we were too close.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12cc
STRING: That distance had to be increased.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f4
STRING: [Torta] “But Natale's just over a week away, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x130a
STRING: [Chris] “I'll practice all of today and tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133c
STRING: [Torta] “...Uh-huh. I'll believe what you say, for now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1352
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1394
STRING: I said goodbye to Torta in the cafeteria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13a0
STRING: Today was Thursday, and she had some errands, it
seemed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ac
STRING: I turned to Phorni, whom I'd ignored up until then.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13c2
STRING: [Chris] “Right, let's go to the practice rooms.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13f4
STRING: [Phorni] “W-Wait a second. Practice rooms? By yourself?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x140a
STRING: [Chris] “You're here, Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x143c
STRING: [Phorni] “Erm, hello?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1452
STRING: [Chris] “...Just kidding. Well then, let's have a little
change of scenery.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1484
STRING: [Phorni] “Who's over there?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x149a
STRING: [Chris] “I've mentioned it before, I think? That's where
Lise is.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14b0
STRING: She probably wasn't there today, which was something
I'd taken into account.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14c6
STRING: Fal had said that she could practice on Thursday, so I
decided to go meet her tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14fe
STRING: I returned Phorni to my shoulder and walked out into
the hallway, when I heard an unexpected voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1530
STRING: [Asino] “Chris, where are you going?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1546
STRING: [Chris] “Asino. Ah, nowhere in particular.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1578
STRING: [Asino] “Oh come on, are you serious?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x158e
STRING: [Chris] “What are you...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15a4
STRING: Was something happening today?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15b0
STRING: I couldn't think of anything, but it didn't seem like Asino
was joking around, either.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c6
STRING: [Chris] “Was something happening today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f8
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah, so this is Asino. He looks a little earnest, I
have to say.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1626
STRING: I didn't notice it during Ms. Cordell's class, but observing
Phorni up close, I saw clearly how intrigued she was by
everything.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1662
STRING: [Asino] “Wow, you have absolutely no idea, do you.
That's just like you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1682
STRING: [Chris] “So... What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16a0
STRING: [Asino] “It was on the bulletin board last week,
remember?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b6
STRING: In the hallway in front of us was the bulletin board,
where notices for the various courses were posted.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16cc
STRING: I'd always walked right by it, but because Asino or Torta
would just tell me the news anyway, I'd never been
severely inconvenienced before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16ec
STRING: Of course, that system wasn't foolproof.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16f8
STRING: But habits were hard to break.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x170e
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry, I haven't looked.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1740
STRING: [Asino] “Chris, I know you're not interested in these
things...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1760
STRING: [Chris] “...I'll pay more attention next time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1776
STRING: At this all-too-familiar exchange, even Asino couldn't
help but smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17a8
STRING: [Asino] “Whatever. Anyway, it's not something you'd
find interesting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c8
STRING: [Chris] “...Don't be so pompous.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e6
STRING: [Asino] “Shoot, we don't have much time. I'll get right to
it. There's a special lecture being held in lecture room B.
Seems to be an annual lecture for third year Fortelle
students only.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1810
STRING: [Chris] “Seems? And why now, of all times...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x182e
STRING: [Asino] “I know, Chris, but perhaps they had some
reason to schedule it now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184e
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1880
STRING: [Asino] “And the speaker for this lecture is... old Grave,
of the house of Cesarini.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a0
STRING: [Chris] “Grave?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d2
STRING: [Asino] “I said you wouldn't be interested, right? But I
didn't say it'd be irrelevant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18fa
STRING: [Asino] “Grave is foremost among the famous Fortelle
players. You must have some idea of what this lecture
means now, don't you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1924
STRING: [Chris] “Yes, more or less.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x193a
STRING: If one were to gain the favor of old Grave, then one's
prospects would instantly improve... Something like that
wouldn't be out of the question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x195a
STRING: Although it really didn't interest me either way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1982
STRING: [Asino] “Doesn't sound like you've forgotten it entirely.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1998
STRING: [Chris] “Well, are you ordering me to attend this
lecture?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19ca
STRING: [Asino] “I won't force you to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19e0
STRING: [Chris] “...In that case, I think I'll pass.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19f6
STRING: I'd said that we were going to the old music rooms, and
I knew Phorni would be bored if the lecture wasn't
focused on performance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a1e
STRING: [Asino] “Sure, I expected that answer anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a34
STRING: Asino dropped the issue right away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a66
STRING: [Asino] “What will you do? Are you heading there after
all?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a7c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aae
STRING: [Asino] “I guess it wasn't a lecture I could've
recommended to you anyway.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ace
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? What does that mean...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aec
STRING: [Asino] “Sorry, I'll explain some other time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b02
STRING: Asino pointed at the clock, indicating that he had to go.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b18
STRING: [Chris] “Thanks for letting me know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b36
STRING: [Asino] “Hey, I said I expected it, didn't I? Besides, you
have things you should be doing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b56
STRING: [Chris] “...I'd have thought that you would too. Anyway,
keep it up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b7e
STRING: [Asino] “Yeah, see you around.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ba2
STRING: Asino walked quickly toward the First Hall. We watched
him go, then set out across campus in the direction of
the Old Wing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c10
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm, this place feels different somehow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c26
STRING: [Chris] “That's because it's hardly used now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c3c
STRING: We took a narrow path amid a thickly growing forest,
and finally arrived at our destination.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c52
STRING: I had only come here a couple of times, but I actually
liked the atmosphere.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c68
STRING: I tried listening out for some sign of Lise, but there was
nothing aside from the sound of the rain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c7e
STRING: Phorni and I would have the whole place to ourselves
today, it seemed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c8a
STRING: [Chris] “Okay, let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cc2
STRING: As expected, there was no one here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cce
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm? Guess Lise isn't here today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d00
STRING: [Phorni] “...So, what do we do?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d16
STRING: [Chris] “We didn't make any promises, so there's
nothing to be done about it...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d52
STRING: [Phorni] “You could ask someone else...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d68
STRING: [Chris] “It's past noon. It's going to be hard to do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d9a
STRING: [Phorni] “...What? If you really wanted to, Chris, surely
it'd be okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dba
STRING: [Chris] “Well, we came all this way to be here, how
about performing together?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df6
STRING: [Phorni] “...Do you really like that song that much?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e0c
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah. Both the song and the lyrics.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e3e
STRING: [Phorni] “W-Who cares about the lyrics...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e54
STRING: [Chris] “I do, that's how much I like the song. I'll get
ready, and then let's start.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e90
STRING: [Phorni] “Er... Is it okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ea6
STRING: [Chris] “I don't think anyone's coming here, so we'll be
okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec4
STRING: [Phorni] “No, I mean, you should be practicing...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1eda
STRING: Phorni's voice was trembling, she sounded really
worried.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ef0
STRING: Even so, when I played a few notes on the Fortelle, her
wings and ears twitched in response.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f06
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, here we go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f40
STRING: [Phorni] “O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f98
STRING: By the time we were satisfied with our progress, it was
getting dark outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fae
STRING: The long-abandoned trees that circled the building
softened the impact of the rain hitting the windows.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fc4
STRING: They helped us concentrate on the music, even though
the building wasn't properly soundproofed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fda
STRING: [Chris] “I guess that's enough for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x200c
STRING: [Phorni] “...See, you didn't practice at all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2022
STRING: [Chris] “Even if I won't perform the song, it still counts as
practice. And besides, is my Fortelle playing that bad?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2068
STRING: [Phorni] “No, but... You can't spend all your time on this,
is what I'm saying.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2088
STRING: [Chris] “There's still time...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x209e
STRING: Compared to the time I had left with Phorni, it seemed
like an eternity.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20b4
STRING: Of course, in terms of physical time, I'd be with Phorni
until the graduation ceremony, which was some time
away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ca
STRING: But within that time, I'd only be able to put Phorni first
until preparations for the graduation recital got
underway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ea
STRING: [Chris] “That's why I want things to be like this, if just for
a little while longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x210a
STRING: I did not mean to say that out loud.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2116
STRING: I did not mean for Phorni to hear that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x213e
STRING: [Phorni] “...Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2154
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry, forget I said that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2186
STRING: [Phorni] “...Ugh, there's nothing to be done.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x219c
STRING: Phorni spoke gently, as if she were indulging me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ce
STRING: [Phorni] “If I'm not watching you, you won't practice
tomorrow, either, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e4
STRING: [Chris] “...Probably.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2216
STRING: [Phorni] “There's absolutely nothing to be done.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x223a
STRING: I'd be bringing Phorni to school tomorrow too, I guess.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2250
STRING: And when I can't find a partner tomorrow, she'll say the
same thing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2266
STRING: “There's nothing to be done, let's do our ensemble.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2272
STRING: I felt our positions had somehow been reversed all of a
sudden, but it was so enjoyable, there was nothing to
be done about it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2288
STRING: ... Yes, there was nothing to be done.
